original_title: Arquitecturas en silencio. Diálogo entre Antoni Bonet y Le Corbusier.
overview: Canòdrom de Meridiana: an emblematic rationalist building in Barcelona. For many years it was a meeting place for neighbors and citizens. In 2006, it closed its doors. Since then it has been empty.
title: Arquitecturas en silencio. Diálogo entre Antoni Bonet y Le Corbusier.
